Fishing-99
Woodcutting-99
Firemaking, fuck firemaking ><
Mining-85-but fuck mining ><
Fletching-99
Strength-99-not related just wanted to say it XD
Cooking-99-^

item.title: EoC Impact on Skilling (Video)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Scyth_, post:19, topic:468523”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=585492.msg4159738#msg4159738 date=1352945191]

[quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=585492.msg4159467#msg4159467 date=1352931378]
EDIT: Posting “INB4” as the Original Poster is silly. Of course you’re in before that happens.
[/quote]I was hoping it would discourage ‘omg this is terrible’ comments made for no reason like this:

looks like crap

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=585492.msg4159616#msg4159616 date=1352939775]
One button dropping.

Holy poop this will be great.
[/quote]Yes

It is going to be a huge step for the better botters

[/quote]I honestly don’t think it’s going to make much of a difference. It’s not hard for bots to right click and drop, and I’m sure if they are just spamming a keypress or pressing it on a timer jagex can detect it. Also, they still have the fact that fishing spots move, rocks deplete, etc. If there are bots still working (even color bots), I dont think this will make much of a difference for them. As for legit players, it’s a huge step for the better.

JaGeX doesn’t log keystrokes or mouse movement from players. And all bots will continue to work unless JaGeX stops programming with Java. Or unless they make the game black and white, then only ASM (injection) bots will work.[/quote]

gl/dx bots…?

Read full topic

item.title: EoC Impact on Skilling (Video)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Er, making it easier to drop items isn’t over the top. I think it’s fine.

Read full topic

item.title: EoC Impact on Skilling (Video)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

You like this because it makes the game easier and faster.
Theirs a limit to making things easier, hell why don’t they just give you a 1.05x exp rate instead?
Rs used to be overthetop now its just getting too easy. Their needs to be a careful mix of inbetween.

Read full topic

item.title: EoC Impact on Skilling (Video)
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:13, topic:468523”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=585492.msg4159467#msg4159467 date=1352931378]
EDIT: Posting “INB4” as the Original Poster is silly. Of course you’re in before that happens.
[/quote]I was hoping it would discourage ‘omg this is terrible’ comments made for no reason like this:

looks like crap

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=585492.msg4159616#msg4159616 date=1352939775]
One button dropping.

Holy poop this will be great.
[/quote]Yes

[quote author=Anieli link=topic=585492.msg4159598#msg4159598 date=1352938646]

It is going to be a huge step for the better botters

[/quote]I honestly don’t think it’s going to make much of a difference. It’s not hard for bots to right click and drop, and I’m sure if they are just spamming a keypress or pressing it on a timer jagex can detect it. Also, they still have the fact that fishing spots move, rocks deplete, etc. If there are bots still working (even color bots), I dont think this will make much of a difference for them. As for legit players, it’s a huge step for the better.[/quote]

JaGeX doesn’t log keystrokes or mouse movement from players. And all bots will continue to work unless JaGeX stops programming with Java. Or unless they make the game black and white, then only ASM (injection) bots will work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Davidi2:

As for legit players, it’s a huge step for the better.

I do agree with this in regards as to Skilling. It looks like they’re streamlining Skills to be better all around for everyone.

item.title: EoC Impact on Skilling (Video)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:7, topic:468523”]EDIT: Posting “INB4” as the Original Poster is silly. Of course you’re in before that happens.[/quote]I was hoping it would discourage ‘omg this is terrible’ comments made for no reason like this:

lostmyphat:

looks like crap

[quote=“rip4d, post:12, topic:468523”]One button dropping.

Holy poop this will be great.[/quote]Yes

[quote=“Anieli, post:11, topic:468523”][quote]It is going to be a huge step for the better botters [/quote][/quote]I honestly don’t think it’s going to make much of a difference. It’s not hard for bots to right click and drop, and I’m sure if they are just spamming a keypress or pressing it on a timer jagex can detect it. Also, they still have the fact that fishing spots move, rocks deplete, etc. If there are bots still working (even color bots), I dont think this will make much of a difference for them. As for legit players, it’s a huge step for the better.

Read full topic
